item.title: How to Build a Videocall Service (WebRTC)
item.description: Photo Source: Interactive Powers, Pexels. Creative Commons In this post we will show you how to build your videocall service based on HTML5 technology by using our API Framework with VideoRTC.js. Step 1: Setting up the basic structure Firstly, you will need to include dependency within your project or web page: <script type="text/javascript" src="videortc.js"></script> You can insert a minimized version if you prefer so: <script type="text/javascript" src="videortc.min.js"></script> Next, we connect with the video gateway server:
